allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add README and complete initial project setup

- Add concise README describing mod purpose
- Complete renaming from examplemod to createrenewable
- Update project configuration and structure

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor package to com.dibujaron.createrenewable

- Update package from com.createrenewable to com.dibujaron.createrenewable
- Move Java files to new package structure
- Update gradle.properties with correct group ID
- Update documentation in claude.md
- Verify build succeeds with new package structure

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add MIT License file

Add formal MIT License with full legal text.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove template license file

Template license is no longer needed now that we have a proper LICENSE file.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
